name: DecimalPercentages
description: Shows decimals in your percentages everywhere.

decimalPlaces.name: Decimal Places
decimalPlaces.description:
The amount of decimal places you want in your percentage.

<cy>If you have DeathScreenTweaks</c> <cl>(DST)</c> <cy>installed, decimal percentage settings from DST</c> <cl>(specifically for "New Best" screens)</c> <cy>will override your preference set here.</c>

ignoreHundredPercent.name: Ignore 100%
ignoreHundredPercent.description:
<cl>Suggested by levigaming1248.</c>

Won't apply decimal points to levels you have completed.

ignoreLevelCell.name: Ignore Level Cells
ignoreLevelCell.description:
<cl>Suggested by levigaming1248.</c>

Won't apply decimal points to level cells (when browsing online levels).

ignorePercentageLabel.name: Ignore "New Best" in Percentage Label
ignorePercentageLabel.description: Won't apply decimal points to the "highest percentage" section of the percentage label <cy>(if the percentage label includes your highest percentage of a level.)</c>

insaneMode.name: Insane Mode
insaneMode.description: For the person who wants to display more than three decimal points outside of the level progress bar.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
